code.description:
Payment code (sepay automatically identifies based on the configuration at Company -> General configuration)
Example: PaymentCodePrefix + random 30 character

content.description: Transfer content. Example: Nguyen Khac Thanh chuyen tien

transferType.description: Transaction type. in is money "in", "out" is money out

JWT.description: Type into the textbox: Bearer {your JWT token}.
JWT.name: Authorization
